Package com.linecorp.centraldogma.server.auth

Interface AuthProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SamlAuthProvider, ShiroAuthProvider
    public interface AuthProvider
    An interface which configures the authentication layer for the Central Dogma server.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String BUILTIN_WEB_BASE_PATH
      A base path of the built-in web app.
      static String BUILTIN_WEB_LOGIN_PATH
      A path which provides a built-in HTML login form to a user.
      static String BUILTIN_WEB_LOGOUT_PATH
      A path which provides a built-in HTML logout page to a user.
      static Set<PathMapping> LOGIN_API_PATH_MAPPINGS
      A set of PathMappings which handles a login request.
      static String LOGIN_PATH
      A login page path for the web console.
      static Set<PathMapping> LOGOUT_API_PATH_MAPPINGS
      A set of PathMappings which handles a logout request.
      static String LOGOUT_PATH
      A logout page path for the web console.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> loginApiService()
      Returns a Service which handles a login request sent from the built-in web login page or somewhere implemented by an AuthProvider.
      default Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> logoutApiService()
      Returns a Service which handles a logout request sent from the built-in web logout page or somewhere implemented by an AuthProvider.
      default Iterable<ServiceWithPathMappings<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse>> moreServices()
      Returns additional Services which are required for working this AuthProvider well.
      default Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> webLoginService()
      Returns a Service which handles a login request from a web browser.
      default Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> webLogoutService()
      Returns a Service which handles a logout request from a web browser.

    • Field Detail

      • LOGIN_PATH

        static final String LOGIN_PATH
        A login page path for the web console. If a user, who has not logged into the web console yet, opens the web console, the web browser would bring the user to the login page.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOGOUT_PATH

        static final String LOGOUT_PATH
        A logout page path for the web console. If a user clicks the logout button on the navigation bar, the web browser would bring the user to the logout page.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BUILTIN_WEB_BASE_PATH

        static final String BUILTIN_WEB_BASE_PATH
        A base path of the built-in web app.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BUILTIN_WEB_LOGIN_PATH

        static final String BUILTIN_WEB_LOGIN_PATH
        A path which provides a built-in HTML login form to a user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BUILTIN_WEB_LOGOUT_PATH

        static final String BUILTIN_WEB_LOGOUT_PATH
        A path which provides a built-in HTML logout page to a user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOGIN_API_PATH_MAPPINGS

        static final Set<PathMapping> LOGIN_API_PATH_MAPPINGS
        A set of PathMappings which handles a login request. It is necessary only if an authentication protocol requires a login feature provided by the server.

      • LOGOUT_API_PATH_MAPPINGS

        static final Set<PathMapping> LOGOUT_API_PATH_MAPPINGS
        A set of PathMappings which handles a logout request. It is necessary only if an authentication protocol requires a logout feature provided by the server.

    • Method Detail

      • webLoginService

        default Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> webLoginService()
        Returns a Service which handles a login request from a web browser. By default, the browser would bring a user to the built-in web login page served on "/web/auth/login".

      • webLogoutService

        default Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> webLogoutService()
        Returns a Service which handles a logout request from a web browser. By default, the browser would bring a user to the built-in web logout page served on "/web/auth/logout".

      • loginApiService

        @Nullable
default Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> loginApiService()
        Returns a Service which handles a login request sent from the built-in web login page or somewhere implemented by an AuthProvider. This service would be added to the server with LOGIN_API_PATH_MAPPINGS only if it is provided.

      • logoutApiService

        @Nullable
default Service<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse> logoutApiService()
        Returns a Service which handles a logout request sent from the built-in web logout page or somewhere implemented by an AuthProvider. This service would be added to the server with LOGOUT_API_PATH_MAPPINGS. If it is not provided, a default service would be added because the web console provides a logout button on the navigation bar by default.

      • moreServices

        default Iterable<ServiceWithPathMappings<HttpRequest,​HttpResponse>> moreServices()
        Returns additional Services which are required for working this AuthProvider well.
